Very good movie, if you look at it as a crime-movie, but up to today no movie has achieved to reflect on what ordinary, private life in the third reich really was like...!
My English is too weak to explain this in detail, yet so many have tried this before...!
Trying to do so just lets you run out of the appropriate words very soon, since you cannot put into words what you cannot understand...!!

Watch this and just feel entertained - 'cause that's what this movie is made for !
This is not a suitable sample for any kind of 'History-Lesson'  !!!

Here's the movoe in short (SPOILER):

Historical variation if Hitler would have won the II-WW, Germania needs US support to survive the cold war with the russians. A female reporter  with bad hairdoo with the help of hero-truth-seking-SS-nazi-officer Rutger Hauer deliver pictures at the end of the coverred-up Holocaust to the visiting american diplomat just before the treaty is finalized. Treaty never happens, Germania colapsez. Rutger Hauer dies shot in the back. THE END.

Just saved you 2 hours of boredom.

@sam 322

Have you actually read the site? It's incredibly historically innacurate, anyone with half a brain can see that. The "proof that the nazis weren't racist" section is just insane. Those "black nazis" were hardly nazis at all, they were fighting with Italian troops in North Africa. The Italians made extensive use of Eritrean forces to fight agains the British in North Africa in the early years of the war. The "Asian Nazis" are Chinese Nationalist soldiers trained in the mid-1930s by Wehrmacht officers. They trained one division, i believe, and equipped them with Wehrmacht uniforms and German weapons. They were trained to fight Communist forces during the Civil War, not becuase they were meant to be part of the Wehrmacht!

Anyone who can still claim that the Nazis were not racist needs to read Mein Kampf and look at the evidence. For instance, look at this quote from Albert Speer's book, about Hitler's reaction to Jesse Owen's victories in the 1936 Olympics (during which only Aryan athletes were allowed to compete on the German side):

"Each of the German victories and there were a surprising number of these made him happy, but he was highly annoyed by the series of triumphs by the marvelous colored American runner, Jesse Owens. People whose antecedents came from the jungle were primitive, Hitler said with a shrug; their physiques were stronger than those of civilized whites and hence should be excluded from future games."

(Source: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jesse_Owens#Berlin_Olympics)

Anyone who is completely denying the Holocaust existed is just a bad historian. There is overwhelming evidence that it occurred, and to deny the atrocity is to white-wash one of the worst occurences in human history, along with the Soviet mass-famines of the 1930s, the Armenian genocide, Japanese atrocities in China and throughout World War II, and several civil wars in Africa in the past few decades (Sudan, Rowanda, etc.)

Learn your history, troll.
